entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 08:56 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Fog

Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
